game.name: Zombie Getaway
game.description:
The biggest horde of zombies has attacked your hometown and it has engulfed all but you are the only who is left. Oh no! These brainless undeads have already started ravaging the city and are looking forward to roam the whole area. What option will you choose between run and die? Join Zombie Getaway and be prepared to challenge the biggest zombie apocalypse by challenging your intense running abilities! Run, jump and duck until you find a safe place to leave again in this brand new action game!

Do not forget to grab the bonuses and keep your character away from the blood-thirsty zombies while running to the safe land. In this total mobile apocalypse, you also have to take care of jumping cars and holes and bashing the brainless undead. You would definitely want to avoid as much zombies as possible by exploring the spooky graphics. Try to alert all the time as you have to run for your life in this fast-paced scrolling arcade game!

Dodge the bloody brute for as long as possible to finish your game with the highest score possible! Collect food and jump over all the obstacles that you see on the street in this 2d infinite running game! Use your bonuses and points to upgrade your skills and make your character stronger and faster than ever before! Good luck to knock them all down in all levels and prove the world that you are the bravest souls of this planet!

game.mobileControlKeys: R ICONS TO TURN FAST, AND JUMP, L ICON TO MOVE L-R
game.webControlKeys: R ICONS TO TURN FAST, AND JUMP, L ICON TO MOVE L-R BY L CLICK OF MOUSE
